item.title: China's Elevated Bus Project Seemed Too Good To Be True â€” And It Was
item.description: July 6, 2017 - Project promoters claimed the giant, elevated vehicle would beat traffic jams by straddling traffic. Last week, they were arrested for fraud. "The idea was absurd, childish," says a longtime critic.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 6, 2017 - Project promoters claimed the giant, elevated vehicle would beat traffic jams by straddling traffic. Last week, they were arrested for fraud. "The idea was absurd, childish," says a longtime critic. http://www.npr.org/sections/parallels/2017/07/06/535625957/chinas-elevated-bus-project-seemed-too-good-to-be-true-and-it-was

item.title: Congress Casts A Suspicious Eye On Russia's Kaspersky Lab
item.description: July 5, 2017 - The renowned Russian cybersecurity firm's anti-virus software is used by millions of Americans. Congress does not want military service members to be among them.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 5, 2017 - The renowned Russian cybersecurity firm's anti-virus software is used by millions of Americans. Congress does not want military service members to be among them. http://www.npr.org/sections/parallels/2017/07/05/535651597/congress-casts-a-suspicious-eye-on-russias-kaspersky-lab

item.title: They Dreamed Of Being Doctors. Now They Help Syrians With The Same Dream
item.description: July 5, 2017 - Two Iranian brothers didn't let a war keep them from medical school. Now they're using mobile phones to build the next generation of doctors in Syria.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 5, 2017 - Two Iranian brothers didn't let a war keep them from medical school. Now they're using mobile phones to build the next generation of doctors in Syria. http://www.npr.org/sections/goatsandsoda/2017/07/05/532140694/medical-school-via-mobile-phone-for-some-syrians-it-s-a-growing-option

item.title: Too Convenient? A Mobile Supermarket That Comes To You
item.description: July 5, 2017 - The Moby Mart concept is being tested in China. A 7-Eleven meets driverless tractor-trailer, the store could be summoned by an app and staffed by a holographic clerk. Are we entering WALL-E world?
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 5, 2017 - The Moby Mart concept is being tested in China. A 7-Eleven meets driverless tractor-trailer, the store could be summoned by an app and staffed by a holographic clerk. Are we entering WALL-E world? http://www.npr.org/sections/alltechconsidered/2017/07/05/535413093/too-convenient-a-mobile-supermarket-that-comes-to-you

item.title: Airlines In Turkey And Dubai Cleared From Laptop Ban
item.description: July 5, 2017 - Turkish Airlines and Emirates announced they are now exempt from the ban on carrying electronics larger than a smartphone into the cabin on flights bound for the U.S.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 5, 2017 - Turkish Airlines and Emirates announced they are now exempt from the ban on carrying electronics larger than a smartphone into the cabin on flights bound for the U.S. http://www.npr.org/sections/thetwo-way/2017/07/05/535584813/airlines-in-turkey-and-dubai-cleared-from-laptop-ban

item.title: Watching Foreign Movies Is Illegal In North Korea, But Some Do It Anyway
item.description: July 5, 2017 - "The idea that North Korea is an information black hole is simply not true anymore," says reporter James Pearson. There's a brisk black-market trade in illicit media on USB sticks and micro SD cards.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 5, 2017 - "The idea that North Korea is an information black hole is simply not true anymore," says reporter James Pearson. There's a brisk black-market trade in illicit media on USB sticks and micro SD cards. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/05/534742750/watching-foreign-movies-is-illegal-in-north-korea-but-plenty-do-it-anyway

item.title: Copenhagen Uses Tech To Tackle Two-Wheel Traffic Jams
item.description: July 4, 2017 - So many environmentally minded Danes now commute by bicycle that the capital city of Copenhagen has installed digital traffic information signs and created apps to help prevent congestion.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 4, 2017 - So many environmentally minded Danes now commute by bicycle that the capital city of Copenhagen has installed digital traffic information signs and created apps to help prevent congestion. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/04/535530425/copenhagen-uses-tech-to-tackle-two-wheel-traffic-jams

item.title: In Germany, Tech Leaders Teach Refugees How To Code
item.description: July 4, 2017 - Most of the refugees who flooded into Germany two years ago have yet to find work. But one bright spot is the tech sector, which is training newcomers to code and fill job market demands.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 4, 2017 - Most of the refugees who flooded into Germany two years ago have yet to find work. But one bright spot is the tech sector, which is training newcomers to code and fill job market demands. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/04/535530409/in-germany-tech-leaders-teach-refugees-how-to-code

item.title: Kaspersky's Russian Roots Come Under Scrutiny
item.description: July 4, 2017 - The Pentagon may soon be prohibited from using anti-virus software and other products from Kaspersky Lab. The Moscow-based company is alleged to have ties to the Kremlin, which Kaspersky denies.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 4, 2017 - The Pentagon may soon be prohibited from using anti-virus software and other products from Kaspersky Lab. The Moscow-based company is alleged to have ties to the Kremlin, which Kaspersky denies. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/04/535530381/kasperskys-russian-roots-come-under-scrutiny

item.title: There Are Plenty Of RFID-Blocking Products, But Do You Need Them?
item.description: July 4, 2017 - An industry has sprung up to make wallets and accessories that block hackers from "skimming" data wirelessly through radio frequency identification. But some experts say there's little need to worry.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 4, 2017 - An industry has sprung up to make wallets and accessories that block hackers from "skimming" data wirelessly through radio frequency identification. But some experts say there's little need to worry. http://www.npr.org/sections/alltechconsidered/2017/07/04/535518514/there-are-plenty-of-rfid-blocking-products-but-do-you-need-them

item.title: In Russia's Siberian Silicon Valley, Business Is Good But Risks Can Be High
item.description: July 4, 2017 - The Soviet Union built research institutes in Siberia as innovation centers during the Cold War. Since then, there's been a brain drain. Tech innovators remain, but some have faced legal challenges.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 4, 2017 - The Soviet Union built research institutes in Siberia as innovation centers during the Cold War. Since then, there's been a brain drain. Tech innovators remain, but some have faced legal challenges. http://www.npr.org/sections/parallels/2017/07/04/535401305/in-russias-siberian-silicon-valley-business-is-good-but-risks-can-be-high

item.title: Does Trump's Behavior On Twitter Amount To Cyberbullying?
item.description: July 4, 2017 - If so, how would that impact the first lady's efforts to take up the issue nationwide? Mary Louise Kelly talks to Parry Aftab, a cyberbullying expert who leads the Internet safety group WiredSafety.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 4, 2017 - If so, how would that impact the first lady's efforts to take up the issue nationwide? Mary Louise Kelly talks to Parry Aftab, a cyberbullying expert who leads the Internet safety group WiredSafety. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/04/535470988/does-trumps-behavior-on-twitter-amount-to-cyberbullying

item.title: Xbox Bowling For Seniors? Visit Your Local Library
item.description: July 4, 2017 - The number of older people involved in the arts programs at the Brooklyn Public Library is up more than 50 percent since last year. They want a chance to write new chapters in a place for all ages.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 4, 2017 - The number of older people involved in the arts programs at the Brooklyn Public Library is up more than 50 percent since last year. They want a chance to write new chapters in a place for all ages. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/04/534431175/xbox-bowling-for-seniors-visit-your-local-library

item.title: In Russia's Tech Center, Scientists Face Rewarding But Unpredictable Life
item.description: July 3, 2017 - Research institutes in Novosibirsk were built as innovation centers in the USSR. Despite the brain drain, scientists and techies remain, but life for successful entrepreneurs can be unpredictable.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 3, 2017 - Research institutes in Novosibirsk were built as innovation centers in the USSR. Despite the brain drain, scientists and techies remain, but life for successful entrepreneurs can be unpredictable. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/03/535425954/in-russias-tech-center-scientists-face-rewarding-but-unpredictable-life

item.title: In Reno, Nev., Homegrown Startups Fuel Tech Transformation
item.description: July 3, 2017 - Reno, Nev., is enjoying a tech boom. Giants like Apple, Google and Tesla are all there. The transformation is also being driven by some homegrown start-ups, but some worry Reno will become unaffordable.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 3, 2017 - Reno, Nev., is enjoying a tech boom. Giants like Apple, Google and Tesla are all there. The transformation is also being driven by some homegrown start-ups, but some worry Reno will become unaffordable. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/03/535408578/in-reno-nev-homegrown-startups-fuel-tech-transformation
